means: 泥土占卜（抓沙散地，按其所成像以断吉凶）

sentence.Network_en: Feng shui, or geomancy in English, is becoming more and more popular in America.
sentence.Network_cn: 风水, 英文称作geomancy, 在美国越来越受到欢迎.

sentence.Network_en: Geomancy is an exotic flower of Chinese traditional culture.
sentence.Network_cn: 风水学是我国传统文化的一朵奇葩.

sentence.Network_en: More and more wealthy Americans are beginning to believe in geomancy.
sentence.Network_cn: 有越来越多有钱的美国人开始相信风水.

PerfectNetExp.abs: J. K.罗琳(J. K. Rowling)称,这个咒语源于西非的西狄奇(Sidiki)方言,本来是用泥土占卜(geomancy)的,字面意思是“对盗贼表示友好(Friendly to thieves)”。.

means.word_mean: 1. divination by means of signs connected with the earth (as points taken at random or the arrangement of particles thrown down at random or from the configuration of a region and its relation to another)

auth_sentence.content: Part of the reason was due to principles of feng shui, or geomancy, which held that digging underground was inauspicious.
